name: part_008
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Shinshoku!! Chikyuu Zeniki Zen Ocean' by UMISEA.
MC transition introducing the next song.
Performance of 'Ryooo-to Kite Kyooo!!!' by UMISEA.

subtitles.original: ...さあ
subtitles.english: ...Come on.

subtitles.original: そっと踏み出した
subtitles.english: I took a gentle step forward

subtitles.original: 小さな勇気が
subtitles.english: and this small bit of courage,

subtitles.original: もう消えないように
subtitles.english: so that it won't ever fade away,

subtitles.original: 繋げよう
subtitles.english: let's connect it all.

subtitles.original: 不安も愛おしさも
subtitles.english: Both our anxieties and our affection,

subtitles.original: 大切に抱きしめて
subtitles.english: let's hold them close to our hearts

subtitles.original: 灯り行くよ
subtitles.english: as we light the way forward.

subtitles.original: 目を合わせて
subtitles.english: Lock eyes with each other.

subtitles.original: 晴れ渡る希望へ
subtitles.english: Towards a clear-skied hope,

subtitles.original: 飛び出せるよ
subtitles.english: we can leap out.

subtitles.original: 突き抜けて行く
subtitles.english: We'll keep pushing through.

subtitles.original: 僕たちの透き通る決意は
subtitles.english: Our transparent determination

subtitles.original: まだまだ止められないよ
subtitles.english: still cannot be stopped.

subtitles.original: ありきたりな今日こそ
subtitles.english: Even an ordinary day like today,

subtitles.original: ときめきに変えてまた
subtitles.english: let's turn it into excitement again.

subtitles.original: 僕たちがいつまでも背中押すから
subtitles.english: Because we'll always be here to support you.

subtitles.original: ずっと一人で描いてた
subtitles.english: I'd been drawing it all alone,

subtitles.original: キャンバスがいつか重なって糸になって
subtitles.english: but the canvases eventually overlapped and became a thread.

subtitles.original: また少しずつ芽生える大好きを紡ぎ
subtitles.english: And little by little, we'll weave the love that starts to sprout.

subtitles.original: どこまでも高く
subtitles.english: Higher and higher,

subtitles.original: あすいろの空へ
subtitles.english: into the sky of tomorrow's color.

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けて行く
subtitles.english: We'll go racing through.

subtitles.original: 僕たちの青春の光は
subtitles.english: The light of our youth

subtitles.original: 誰にも止められないよ
subtitles.english: cannot be stopped by anyone.

subtitles.original: 笑い合う度優しくこぼれる涙さえ
subtitles.english: Every time we laugh together, even the tears that softly spill,

subtitles.original: 今ほら輝かせ明日へ運ぶから
subtitles.english: look, they'll shine and carry us into tomorrow.

subtitles.original: 君の隣へ
subtitles.english: To your side.

subtitles.original: 僕たちは世界を越えて行く
subtitles.english: We will transcend the world.

subtitles.original: 迎えに行くよ
subtitles.english: We're coming to get you.

subtitles.original: まだ見えない明日も煌めきに変えてきっと
subtitles.english: Even the unseen tomorrow, we'll surely turn into a sparkle.

subtitles.original: 僕たちが未来へと
subtitles.english: As we head into the future...

subtitles.original: 果てのない未来へと
subtitles.english: Into an endless future...

subtitles.original: 連れて行くから
subtitles.english: ...we'll take you there.

subtitles.original: 地平線を水平線にしたら
subtitles.english: If we turn the horizon into a sea-level line,

subtitles.original: らーSea らーSea らーSea-Sea!
subtitles.english: Ra-Sea ra-Sea ra-Sea-Sea!

subtitles.original: WAHHHHH!!!
subtitles.english: WAHHHHH!!!

subtitles.original: 浸食! Sing! Shock! 浸食! Sing! Shock!
subtitles.english: Invasion! Sing! Shock! Invasion! Sing! Shock!

subtitles.original: 海流でみんなに HELLO HELLO
subtitles.english: Saying HELLO HELLO to everyone via the currents!

subtitles.original: 浸食! Sing! Shock! 浸食! Sing! Shock!
subtitles.english: Invasion! Sing! Shock! Invasion! Sing! Shock!

subtitles.original: 深水 深海 Swing & Sweet
subtitles.english: Deep water, deep sea, Swing & Sweet!

subtitles.original: ふー!
subtitles.english: Phew!

subtitles.original: 高い 名誉 清楚の称号 4人でかっさらっちゃったろ
subtitles.english: High honor, the title of 'pure', the four of us snatched it all!

subtitles.original: さあさあさあ さあさあさあ
subtitles.english: Now, now, now! Now, now, now!

subtitles.original: 地球を侵略 TAKODAのCHに登場
subtitles.english: Invading the Earth, appearing on TAKODA's channel!

subtitles.original: いないないなー いないなー
subtitles.english: Now you see us, now you don't!

subtitles.original: えっこれで海賊本職化!? 鮫コスプレってことじゃん!
subtitles.english: Wait, does this make piracy our full-time job?! It's just a shark cosplay!

subtitles.original: キミたちも本物の味 知りたいのね?
subtitles.english: You guys want to know the taste of the real thing too, right?

subtitles.original: Shrimp, と salmon, サメぜんぶ食べます
subtitles.english: Shrimp and salmon, the shark eats it all!

subtitles.original: (eat shrimp... we eat every single shrimp on the earth... oh mic's on!)
subtitles.english: (eat shrimp... we eat every single shrimp on the earth... oh mic's on!)

subtitles.original: 全人類乗船 母なる海へと
subtitles.english: All of humanity on board, head to the mother sea!

subtitles.original: 水に落とされて... 最高のDeep blue
subtitles.english: Dropped into the water... into the ultimate Deep Blue!

subtitles.original: 私(あてぃし)達の海へご招待
subtitles.english: We invite you to our ocean!

subtitles.original: (Our showtime!!)
subtitles.english: (Our showtime!!)

subtitles.original: そんじゃ
subtitles.english: Well then!

subtitles.original: (1) Depart the harbor
subtitles.english: (1) Depart the harbor

subtitles.original: (2) Launch our marine jet
subtitles.english: (2) Launch our marine jet

subtitles.original: (3) Start a sharkventure
subtitles.english: (3) Start a sharkventure

subtitles.original: (4) And TAKO-over the world with sea
subtitles.english: (4) And TAKO-over the world with sea

subtitles.original: Here we go / いっせーの
subtitles.english: Here we go / All together now!

subtitles.original: はい はい はい
subtitles.english: Hai! Hai! Hai!

subtitles.original: おーしゃん おーしゃん Lovely ocean
subtitles.english: Ocean! Ocean! Lovely Ocean!

subtitles.original: みちびいた新世界
subtitles.english: Leading us to a brand new world!

subtitles.original: 青い星をウルトラマリンに染めて
subtitles.english: Dyeing the blue planet in ultramarine!

subtitles.original: いぇー いぇー いぇー!
subtitles.english: Yeah! Yeah! Yeah!

subtitles.original: おーしゃん おーしゃん Epic ocean
subtitles.english: Ocean! Ocean! Epic Ocean!

subtitles.original: 全域全おーしゃん 止まらないかい
subtitles.english: The entire area is an ocean! Can't stop us now, can you?

subtitles.original: AQUA 満杯 Blueat Planetへ進め
subtitles.english: Filled with AQUA! Head towards the Blueat Planet!

subtitles.original: ヨーソロー ヨーソロー! (よっしゃー!)
subtitles.english: Yousoro! Yousoro! (Alright!)

subtitles.original: この星を一雫にしたら
subtitles.english: If we turn this planet into a single drop,

subtitles.original: らーSea らーSea らーSea-Sea! WAHHHH!!!
subtitles.english: Ra-Sea ra-Sea ra-Sea-Sea! WAHHHH!!!

subtitles.original: 続いては新曲！
subtitles.english: Next up is a new song!

subtitles.original: 『りゅーーっときてきゅーーっ！！！』
subtitles.english: "Ryooo-to Kite Kyooo!!!"

subtitles.original: はい、はい！
subtitles.english: Hai, hai!

subtitles.original: おー、みんな盛り上がってるかーい！
subtitles.english: Oh, is everyone getting excited?!

subtitles.original: りゅーーっときてきゅーっ
subtitles.english: Ryooo-to kite kyooo!

subtitles.original: 大地も大海も巻き込んで大波乱～！？
subtitles.english: Engulfing both the land and the vast sea in a great upheaval!?

subtitles.original: (WE ARE UMISEA!! UMISEA.JP!!)
subtitles.english: (WE ARE UMISEA!! UMISEA.JP!!)

subtitles.original: ぎゅーっとして ちゅーっとして りゅーっときてきゅーっ！！！！
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, give me a kiss, and ryooo-to kite kyooo!!!!

subtitles.original: ぱっぱっぱ やっぱっぱ ぱっぱっ しゅいふっく
subtitles.english: Pa pa pa ya pa pa pa pa shuifukku!

subtitles.original: ぱっぱっぱ やっぱっぱ ぱっぱっ パラダイス
subtitles.english: Pa pa pa ya pa pa pa pa paradise!

subtitles.original: ぱや ぱや ぱや ぱや
subtitles.english: Paya paya paya paya!

subtitles.original: あらくれ海に浸食船
subtitles.english: An invasion ship in the rough seas!

subtitles.original: 大波 小波で 水の中 (ありゃ〜)
subtitles.english: Big waves, small waves, inside the water (Whoops~)

subtitles.original: なんやかやんで サメとタコ どっかにさらわれて
subtitles.english: Somehow or another, the shark and octopus were carried off somewhere!

subtitles.original: 行方不明
subtitles.english: Now missing in action!
